COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126
STRING: I came to the cafeteria for my lunch as always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x132
STRING: The seat by the window Chris was sitting in was at our
special table.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148
STRING: I'd heard that he was watching the rain, but I didn't
know why.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15e
STRING: It was the same to me whether the rain was falling or
not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: [Torta] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: Chris was stirring his spoon disinterestedly through the
risotto on his plate.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1be
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d4
STRING: Chris had put his bag on the seat next to him for me as
always, but it must have been open because there was
sheet music poking out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f4
STRING: [Torta] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x226
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c
STRING: [Torta] “This.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x252
STRING: I was interested, so I pulled it out and waved it in front
of Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x270
STRING: [Chris] “What's this sheet music?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x286
STRING: [Torta] “Is it the song for the recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8
STRING: [Chris] “For now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ce
STRING: [Torta] “Do you have the whole thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ec
STRING: [Chris] “For now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x302
STRING: [Torta] “Umm... That habit of just saying, ‘for now...’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x334
STRING: [Chris] “You're telling me to stop, right? I'm working on
it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34a
STRING: [Torta] “For now... Right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x374
STRING: I stopped the aimless exchange there, and asked him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x380
STRING: Though that type of back and forth was when I sensed
the most happiness in him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x396
STRING: [Torta] “So, can I look?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead. I'll be eating.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ca
STRING: [Torta] “Okay, thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ec
STRING: In my head, I replayed the notes written on the sheet
music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f8
STRING: It took some time to imagine the sounds and recognize
it as a piece of music.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40e
STRING: There were no lyrics written, so I just tried singing the
scales in my head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x424
STRING: It was a sad melody, very much like Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x430
STRING: There were far more dark chords than cheery ones, and
the song followed that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x446
STRING: It certainly seemed like it would suit the tone of Chris's
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45c
STRING: But I thought he used to write happier songs.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x468
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x492
STRING: I had read it to the end, so I stacked the sheet music in
order.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a8
STRING: Chris had finished eating at the same time and looked
at me, as if he wanted to hear my opinion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4be
STRING: [Torta] “Wow, it's a pretty good song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f0
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x506
STRING: [Torta] “You did what you needed to anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x538
STRING: [Chris] “Did you think I was doing nothing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54e
STRING: [Torta] “But you haven't chosen a partner yet, have you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x580
STRING: [Chris] “No, I haven't yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x596
STRING: [Torta] “No matter how good the song is...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c8
STRING: [Chris] “Ms. Cordell just gave me the same talk.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5de
STRING: [Torta] “Oh? Ms. Cordell is right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: [Chris] “But why the both of you all of a sudden?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x626
STRING: [Torta] “We're into December this week. You only have
two months left, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x662
STRING: [Chris] “Wouldn't you say two whole months?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x678
STRING: [Torta] “No, I wouldn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a2
STRING: [Torta] “＊sigh＊ Whatever; I'm going to have my lunch.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c0
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e4
STRING: I used that opportunity to open the lunch I had packed
for myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fa
STRING: I hadn't told Chris, but I had gotten much better at
cooking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x710
STRING: But that wasn't something that Chris should know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: Arie was the one who could cook, not me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: That year I had finally gotten to the point where I
wouldn't mind letting Chris eat my cooking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: But even though I worked to gain the skill, the only time
I used it was when I was Arietta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75e
STRING: Even that was once a year, if it happened at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x76a
STRING: [Torta] “So, do you have any ideas?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x79c
STRING: [Chris] “That may be the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b2
STRING: [Torta] “So you don't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e4
STRING: [Chris] “Don't jump to conclusions.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fa
STRING: [Torta] “I know that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x810
STRING: I was already used to Chris's tone when he was
covering something up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x838
STRING: [Chris] “No, it's not that I don't have any ideas.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x84e
STRING: My mouth was full, but his words surprised me, so I
spoke in spite of myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x864
STRING: [Torta] “Aw cass...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x896
STRING: [Chris] “Don't talk with your mouth full.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ac
STRING: [Torta] “Mm... Of course, it's someone other than me,
right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8de
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f4
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Is there really someone?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x912
STRING: [Chris] “You seem really surprised...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x928
STRING: [Torta] “By the way... Who? Do I know them?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93e
STRING: I thought I always knew what Chris was doing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94a
STRING: So I could follow through with my lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: To the end, to buy time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x962
STRING: That was even the case with the rain hallucination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96e
STRING: I was very careful to ensure that Chris wouldn't talk
about it with someone and end up embarrassing
himself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9aa
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c0
STRING: Chris shut his mouth, looking like he had said more than
he should have.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9cc
STRING: It wasn't his light tone of a moment ago used to cover
things up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d8
STRING: It was the tone he used when he was ashamed of
something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: [Torta] “Wow, so you really did work on it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: I couldn't dismiss the possibility that it was a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa06
STRING: No, even if the student was a boy, if they got close, he
might say things he shouldn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa24
STRING: [Chris] “I kind of did...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3a
STRING: [Torta] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa50
STRING: Even I could hear the irritation in my voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5c
STRING: I knew that it was just simple jealousy, but I couldn't
stop it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa72
STRING: And then Chris...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7e
STRINGS: he started explaining like he'd given up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabc
STRING: Chris didn't deny it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae4
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it's not like I'm doing nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xafa
STRING: [Torta] “Huh, I see. That's good! Is it a girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb10
STRING: The sense of duty that made me need to investigate
mixed with my jealousy as a woman, and I said this with
a thorny tone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? What do you mean about a girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb62
STRING: [Torta] “I'm asking if it's a girl... Have you heard the
rumors? You haven't. You don't know much about that
stuff, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: [Chris] “You answered my question with a question...
And you don't know that I don't know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc8
STRING: [Torta] “So? Is it a girl?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbde
STRING: I hated myself for just asking if it was a girl and not
asking “Who?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf4
STRING: But who it was wasn't especially the problem.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc12
STRING: [Chris] “Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: [Torta] “Ah, you hesitated.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc46
STRING: [Chris] “Of course I did.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc5c
STRING: Which meant, perhaps, he felt regret.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc68
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe I should tell my sister.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc7e
STRING: That's why I brought her up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc8a
STRING: Even if Chris bent to that, there was nothing good in it
for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca0
STRING: There was no mistake that what was motivating me was
the last fortress in my heart, the fact that I was sending
the letters.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd2
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... This has nothing to with Arie. Aaah,
alright, I get it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf2
STRING: [Torta] “So you're ready to confess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd24
STRING: [Chris] “Confess... Huh. Odd choice of words.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3a
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd50
STRING: At the same time, Chris's voice rang with defeat.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd5c
STRING: I couldn't sense any regret, and instead the normal
cheer had returned to his voice, like he was apologetic.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7a
STRING: [Chris] “I said I had an idea, but the truth is, it isn't
decided yet. If it comes to the crunch, Ms. Cordell will
ask a voice student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda4
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, so that means you haven't decided yet?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdba
STRING: I had to work a little bit to not let the happiness show in
my voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd8
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: [Torta] “So... You're slacking off!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe20
STRING: [Chris] “I suppose so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: [Torta] “It's like you think it's someone else's job.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe68
STRING: [Chris] “You could say that. It doesn't feel real.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe7e
STRING: [Torta] “This isn't the time for that kind of thing, is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb0
STRING: [Chris] “The time doesn't matter. Things usually just
move ahead when the time comes, don't they?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed0
STRING: [Torta] “But if they don't?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeee
STRING: [Chris] “I'll think about it then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf0c
STRING: [Chris] “Is that bad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf22
STRING: [Torta] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf38
STRING: I heaved a big sigh, and forgave him that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf44
STRING: Wanting to put it off... I suppose I could understand.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf50
STRING: [Torta] “Well, alright. This is just like you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6e
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for understanding. Anyway, what was
that about a rumor?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf8e
STRING: [Torta] “So you didn't know, then?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfac
STRING: [Chris] “No. So?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc8
STRING: Chris started explaining like he'd given up.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff0
STRING: [Chris] “Umm... I said I had an idea, but the truth is, it
isn't decided yet. If it comes to the crunch, Ms. Cordell
will ask a voice student.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Oh, I see...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1030
STRING: I felt suddenly deflated by that answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: [Chris] “You see; what did you think it was?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: [Torta] “N-Nothing. Yeah, right... I didn't believe the
rumor would apply to you, Chris. I didn't think you'd
cheat on Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1098
STRING: I concluded jokingly to cover up my feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c0
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d6
STRING: [Torta] “I'm kidding, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1108
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x111e
STRING: Chris shook his head lightly, as if he'd given up on that
as well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1134
STRING: His willingness to give up was useful at times like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Torta] “Hehe...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1172
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1188
STRING: [Torta] “Nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11ba
STRING: [Chris] “Whatever...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d0
STRING: [Torta] “I like that about you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: [Chris] “Like what?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1218
STRING: [Torta] “That you're a little... irresponsible.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124a
STRING: [Chris] “What? That's not a good thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1260
STRING: [Torta] “That's not true.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: [Chris] “＊sigh＊ Whatever.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: Saying this, Chris laughed as if it didn't matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12be
STRING: [Torta] “But.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f0
STRING: [Chris] “What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1306
STRING: [Torta] “You should probably fix that irresponsible
side...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1326
STRING: Right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1332
STRING: He had to fix it someday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133e
STRING: And that time was definitely drawing near.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134a
STRING: But for now, I wanted him to laugh like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1356
STRING: So that I could laugh, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x136a
STRING: [Chris] “What's that about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1380
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha. You don't need to know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13aa
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c0
STRING: [Torta] “So what were we talking about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f2
STRING: [Chris] “The rumor, I think?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1408
STRING: [Torta] “Rumor, which one?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143a
STRING: [Chris] “That's what I'm asking. You're the one talking
about believing rumors and cheating, aren't you, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145a
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, that rumor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x148c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. So, what is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a8
STRING: [Torta] “It's the same old stuff. I think it was that the
men and women who perform together at the
graduation recital end up together forever... or
something.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c8
STRING: It was something I'd heard from my voice student friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d4
STRING: It was talk you'd hear anywhere, but there were
grounds for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e8
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah that's something you'd hear at any school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fe
STRING: [Torta] “Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1530
STRING: [Chris] “Huh. You don't seem very interested, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah. I mean, people whose tastes match, tend
to match up as people, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1566
STRING: [Torta] “They practice long hours together, and they like
so many of the same things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a2
STRING: [Chris] “They have similar goals as well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b8
STRING: [Torta] “Yeah, right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ce
STRING: Chris said this seemingly devoid of interest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15da
STRING: [Torta] “Of course, you're not interested, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f0
STRING: That made me a little happy, so I smiled faintly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: [Chris] “I haven't decided on my partner yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1624
STRING: [Torta] “And yet you go on with such confidence.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1656
STRING: [Chris] “Go on?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166c
STRING: [Torta] “About the psychology of men and women in
love.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x169e
STRING: [Chris] “Even though you said more than half of it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b4
STRING: [Torta] “You were right there with me, Chris. It doesn't
suit you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16e6
STRING: [Chris] “Who doesn't it suit? At least I have a girlfriend.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16fc
STRING: [Torta] “My big sister doesn't count. You just ended up
with her because you were friends.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1724
STRING: [Chris] “You're one to talk, you've never even been in a
relationship.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x173a
STRING: [Torta] “Big words from someone who thinks that what
they know is all there is to know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1766
STRING: After saying this with a smile, Chris gazed out the
window silently for a while, like he was lost in thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177c
STRING: I didn't talk to him at times like these.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1788
STRING: I knew that it was a habit of Chris's. I'd seen Arie smiling
while waiting for him to finish many times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a8
STRING: And maybe that's what Chris wanted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17be
STRING: I watched Chris's face like that for a while, and realized
that he noticed me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d4
STRING: I made sure he was fully with me, and spoke to him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17ea
STRING: [Torta] “You're lost in thought again.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x181c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1832
STRING: [Torta] “No, it's fine... Anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1864
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x187a
STRING: [Torta] “You have to find a partner soon. Okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1890
STRING: And if it was me... That would be best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18b8
STRING: [Chris] “I know. Well, I will.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ce
STRING: [Torta] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ec
STRING: [Chris] “Really. Ms. Cordell's on my case, too. What
about you, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190c
STRING: [Torta] “Me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x192a
STRING: [Chris] “Do you have a partner already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1940
STRING: [Torta] “Uh-uh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1972
STRING: [Chris] “But you said...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1988
STRING: [Torta] “I think... It would be best for you if you didn't
say any more, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19c4
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19da
STRING: Chris asked curiously, like he really didn't realize.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f0
STRING: If he was thinking of voice and Fortelle students as one
and the same...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a06
STRING: I was amazed, but I explained it carefully to him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1c
STRING: [Torta] “Voice students can perform solo. Well, the
marks are better when paired with a Fortelle player, so
there are quite a few people working on that
assumption.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a4e
STRING: [Chris] “But are you going to perform solo, Torta?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a64
STRING: [Torta] “It'd be easier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a96
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aac
STRING: [Torta] “And if a certain someone really can't find a
partner, it would be better if there was at least one
candidate, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae0
STRING: That's why I wasn't paired up with any other Fortelle
performers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1af6
STRING: I had been asked by many young male students that I
knew, but I turned them all down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b0c
STRING: Because we always ate lunch together like this, most
other students basically understood Chris's and my
relationship.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b22
STRING: Chris was the only one who didn't know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2e
STRING: Even the people that asked me seemed to know, of
course, and they had asked about my relationship with
Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b44
STRING: I told them honestly that I liked Chris, and that finished
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5a
STRING: If I was nice to them, they'd never leave me alone.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b66
STRING: It was my plan that no more people would ask me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b84
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b9a
STRING: After a long silence, Chris said this as if ashamed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bb0
STRING: Chris realized how I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bbc
STRING: I wasn't trying to hide it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bc8
STRING: If I made it obvious to Chris, and his feelings changed
toward me... I did have silly ideas like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bde
STRING: But at the moment, it didn't seem like I had been
successful in that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf4
STRING: [Torta] “But that doesn't mean you don't need to look.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c26
STRING: [Chris] “I know... But.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c3c
STRING: The fact that I didn't want to, but nevertheless had to
say it, was a little hard for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c5a
STRING: [Chris] “Don't you think it's unfair that vocalists are free
to choose like that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7a
STRING: [Torta] “No, I don't. I mean, just being able to play the
Fortelle gets students special treatment at the school.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca2
STRING: [Chris] “I didn't ask for that. And it may be special
treatment, but I still work hard. I can't help that I was
born this way, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ccc
STRING: [Torta] “Being born like this is important in this case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cea
STRING: [Chris] “Only for the rarity value.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: Chris seemed uninterested, but he said this like he really
meant it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d16
STRING: I wouldn't want him to become as brazen as Asino, but
it wasn't good that he was so detached.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d2c
STRING: But that was also a good thing about Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d38
STRING: And it was something that I liked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d44
STRING: [Torta] “Ah-ha-ha, I think it's amazing you're not just
trying to be humble, Chris. You really feel that way.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d80
STRING: [Chris] “What a compliment...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d96
STRING: [Torta] “Maybe it wasn't.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dc8
STRING: [Chris] “Which is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dde
STRING: [Torta] “Why don't you choose?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e10
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, then it wasn't a compliment.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e26
STRING: [Torta] “Fine, then. Of course you would be so negative,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e70
STRING: As we talked like this, time passed quickly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e7c
STRING: I glanced at the clock, and noticed it was almost time
for the lunch break to end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e88
STRING: In the end, I decided to ask Chris, just to be sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eb2
STRING: [Torta] “Oh, I could help you look if you want. I can
introduce you to some people.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ed2
STRING: I wasn't very serious, but the situation dictated that I
had to say it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ee8
STRING: I thought I said it as cheerily as I could.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f06
STRING: [Chris] “I think I'll take you up on that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f1c
STRING: Unexpectedly, Chris seemed to want to look seriously,
and nodded after thinking for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f32
STRING: [Torta] “Okay. I'll ask around, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f56
STRING: There was a lot that I had to think about, but being with
Chris now really made me happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f6c
STRING: I didn't have the ability to escape the complicated web
of truth and lies.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f78
STRING: At times like these, I was a little girl again.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f84
STRING: I had promised to pretend to be calculating and lie to
protect Chris.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f9a
STRING: But it was still true that just being with Chris made me
happy.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fcc
STRING: [Chris] “Right. But you have some ideas, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe2
STRING: [Torta] “I know what you lack, Chris. Just stick with me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201e
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah, okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2056
STRING: [Torta] “First... Right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x206c
STRING: We left the cafeteria and walked straight to the hallway
lined with practice rooms.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2078
STRING: On Mondays, the rooms were full of students who were
making up for missing two days of practice over the
weekend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x208e
STRING: But, it was perfect at the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x209a
STRING: I was always with Chris, so I didn't have many
acquaintances either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b0
STRING: I thought this place gave me the best chance of seeing
someone I recognized.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e2
STRING: [Chris] “What are we doing here?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f8
STRING: [Torta] “Hmm? Oh, I wanted to ask someone I know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210e
STRING: I answered Chris, fidgeting behind me, while I peeked
into the small window of a practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x212c
STRING: [Chris] “Ask them... How?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2142
STRING: In one of the practice rooms was a friend that I talked
to frequently, though we weren't that close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2158
STRING: But... I had no intention of introducing him to a girl.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2164
STRING: I remembered saying I was looking for a partner for a
Fortelle student, but she knew about Chris and me, so it
was nothing more than me asking her indirectly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x218e
STRING: Of course, I didn't let Chris know that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219a
STRING: If it was necessary, I could rely on Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a6
STRING: Though I didn't see the need for it at the moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21b2
STRING: [Torta] “Oops, not someone I know. Next.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e4
STRING: [Chris] “Umm...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21fa
STRING: [Torta] “Umm, maybe here... Ah, here we are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2210
STRING: I ignored him and peeked into the next room, where I
saw the face of a boy who I at least knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2226
STRING: I remembered his name, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2232
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2248
STRING: [Torta] “Wait a sec.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2282
STRING: A small sound must have reached him. He came out
after a while with a surprised face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2298
STRING: Well, I suppose that was the expected reaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a4
STRING: I would never talk to him normally, yet there I was
suddenly knocking on the door while he practiced.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ba
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Well-well, Tortinita.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d0
STRING: [Torta] “Hello. Umm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22f0
STRING: Even so, I wanted to avoid giving a bad impression, and
as I continued talking around the subject, he clearly
seemed to calm down.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2306
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Ah-ha-ha. So, what did you want?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x231c
STRING: [Torta] “About that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: Saying this, I then finally told him why I was there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x233e
STRING: I introduced Chris simply, and stepped back half a step
so they could talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2368
STRING: I thought he'd at least introduce himself, but Chris just
stood there looking troubled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x237e
STRING: [Torta] “Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2394
STRING: [Schoolboy] “Uh... Umm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b2
STRING: [Chris] “Afternoon.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23c8
STRING: [Torta] “A-Anyway...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23f4
STRING: In the end, no matter how much I talked him up, it was
obvious to anyone how little Chris wanted to do it, and
we were unable to find anyone willing to partner up
with a student like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2414
STRING: Even if a person like that existed, they'd have to be
incredibly curious, or be charmed by the sound of
Chris's Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2434
STRING: Or... Someone who liked Chris as much as I did.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2448
STRING: I was secretly satisfied with the outcome, and it seemed
I needed to hide it.
